      static Notification createNotification(Context context, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String msg)
      Returns a notification object in the context of the app
      static void scheduleNotification(Context context, Notification notification, int eventHash, int delay)

    • Method Detail

      • createNotification

        public static Notification createNotification(Context context,
                                              java.lang.String title,
                                              java.lang.String msg)
        Returns a notification object in the context of the app
        Parameters:
        context - the Context of the application
        title - String: title of the notification in the status bar
        msg - String: content of the notification to be displayed
        Returns:
        Notification: the constructed notification object

      • scheduleNotification

        public static void scheduleNotification(Context context,
                                        Notification notification,
                                        int eventHash,
                                        int delay)
        Schedules the supplied notification object to occur in *delay* milliseconds Uses the alarm manager service to handle the delay
        Parameters:
        context - the Context of the application
        notification - the notificaiton to be displayed
        eventHash - ID of the event, used to reschedule the notification if needed
        delay - the time to delay the notification in milliseconds
